text: Ate jekara alaha tuhanu kise afata vica jakara lave, tam usa tom binham ko'i nahim jihara usa nu dura kara sake. Ate jekara uha tuhanu ko'i sukha dena cahe tam usa di kirapa nu ko'i rokana vala nahim. Uha apani kirapa apane badi'am vicom jisa nu cahuda hai bakhasa dida hai. Uha mu'afa karana vala, rahimata vala hai
